title: Recore E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Tim and Colin breakdown the Recore E3 2016 Trailer!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

transcript_chunks.text: E3 2016 is happening. Kinda Funny is going all out with Let's Plays and reaction videos all week long. Subscribe now at youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames to not miss a thing. What's up, guys? I'm Tim Gettys. This is the illustrious Colin Moriarty. You taught me that word. Good. I'm I'm glad. It's a fantastic word. Um now, so right now we are here on youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames covering all the E3 stuff, including ReCore. Here's the very surprising trailer, at least it was surprising to me. Yeah, didn't expect this. Yeah, it's very stylish. Um I mean, I expected to see ReCore at the show, but um and we know the release date had leaked or rumors of the release date had leaked in September. Those those rumors are true, coming Xbox One and PC. Um but uh this is a game by Armature um with the help of Keiji Inafune, who the creator Mega Man and Onimusha and Dead Rising. Um and uh it's an interesting game. I think that my reaction to it once we get into the actual gameplay after this this kind of intro is um it's kind of

creator Mega Man and Onimusha and Dead Rising. Um and uh it's an interesting game. I think that my reaction to it once we get into the actual gameplay after this this kind of intro is um it's kind of budget looking, I guess. Um not quite on the scale uh graphically or aesthetically as the other AAA games that they're showing. Yeah, I don't know that they really treated this as a AAA game. I mean, they revealed it last year, but they didn't really show anything. Um still, I think the game looks really fun. That's really what's most important. I will I a lot of people say like I always say gameplay is king. That's mostly true, almost always. There are exceptions where it's not true. Um but this is obviously being a third-person action shooter platformer. It's kind of interesting little hybrid. So it looks kind of cool. I was saying this earlier during our our live show, but I'm getting a lot of Mega Man X vibes at least from the imagine if you take Mega Man X and put it in in 3D and that's obviously a high

of cool. And then earlier she was using kind of the the weapons to move the environment to be able to to get across sections. I'm like that. It's pretty cool. And uh as as budgeted as it looks like this is what I'm talking about right here. Like this really looks like Mega Man X to me. I thought I was ReCore was going to be a bit more of like a quiet game, but this look looks kind of loud and action-packed. So I'm excited about that. Let us know what you think about ReCore in the comments below and stay tuned to youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames for all your E3 2016 needs.
